author: Kevin Woodford
method: Place the squash in a pan full of cold water with a teaspoon of salt.  Bring to the boil and cook for 10-15 minutes. Drain and place back in the pan. With a potato masher or ricer, mash the squash.  Add the butter, milk, salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste, and serve.
ingredients: Â½ butternut squash, mashed,  1 tsp salt,  1 tbsp butter,  splash of milk,  salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
